4 Wire xVDT

4 Wire xVDT contains the settings and position value for this 4 wire xVDT. The item is named xVDT to indicate the same IP works for several different physical simulations like RVDT and LVDT.

What do you want to do?

Set the sensitivity for this xVDT

To set the sensitiviy for this xVDT, modify the sensitivity control on the page below. The units of sensitvity is V/V/(position units). The sensitivity is multiplied by the position value to calculate a scaling factor. That scaling factor is then multiplied by the input excitation value to produce the physical output of the simulated xVDT.

Set the position units for this xVDT

To set the position units for this xVDT, modify the position units control on the page below.

For more information about adding and configuring custom devices, refer to the Configuring and Running a Project book of the NI VeriStand Help, available by selecting Help»Search the NI VeriStand Help.
